name: ING-GRAD d.d.
nace: Construction of residential and non-residential buildings
description:
ING-GRAD was established in 1991 and has since become one of Croatia’s leading construction companies, renowned for its stability, continuous growth, and balanced development across all business segments.

ING-GRAD carries out a wide range of construction works, from the restoration of historic buildings and sacred architecture to the construction of modern commercial and residential buildings, as well as construction projects in the sectors of energy and infrastructure.

The company’s operations are founded on integrity, dedication, and a strong commitment to each client, core values that have ensured its long-standing success in the construction industry.

The work and philosophy of ING-GRAD is best reflected in the slogan "Building the future, restoring the heritage".
